hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Adhering to religion will only become harder and worldly affairs will only become more difficult, and people will only become more stingy, and the Hour will only come upon the worst of people, and the only Mahdi (after Muhammad (ﷺ)) is ‘Eisa bin Maryam.”
